com.xing.api.resources

Class GroupsResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xing.api.Resource
      • com.xing.api.resources.GroupsResource

  • public class GroupsResource
extends Resource
    Resource for all the possible groups calls.

    • Method Detail

      • getUsersGroups

        public CallSpec<java.util.List<Group>,HttpError> getUsersGroups(java.lang.String userId)
        Get the list of groups the given user belongs to. A note on user state: The user state field will have one of the following values: MEMBER, PENDING_MEMBER, MODERATOR, OWNER. A note on latest posts: The with_latest_posts parameter may be used to return up to 10 posts. Please see the get posts of a group call for full details of the response format.

        Possible optional query parameters:

        Parameter Name Description
        limit The default limit is 10, the maximum limit is 100
        offset The default offset is 0.
        order_by Parameter that determines the ascending order of the returned list. Currently only supports "latest_post". Defaults to "id"
        user_fields Author attributes to return within latest_posts, if requested. For a list of available profile user attributes, please refer to the get user details call.
        with_latest_posts Number of latest posts to include for each group. Must be non-negative. Default: 1, Maximum: 10.
        Parameters:
        userId - Id of the users who's groups should be returned.
        Returns:
        A callSpec object ready to execute the request.

      • getOwnGroups

        public CallSpec<java.util.List<Group>,HttpError> getOwnGroups()
        Get the list of groups for the current logged in user. A note on user state: The user state field will have one of the following values: MEMBER, PENDING_MEMBER, MODERATOR, OWNER. A note on latest posts: The with_latest_posts parameter may be used to return up to 10 posts. Please see the get posts of a group call for full details of the response format.

        Possible optional query parameters:

        Parameter Name Description
        limit The default limit is 10, the maximum limit is 100
        offset The default offset is 0.
        order_by Parameter that determines the ascending order of the returned list. Currently only supports "latest_post". Defaults to "id"
        user_fields Author attributes to return within latest_posts, if requested. For a list of available profile user attributes, please refer to the get user details call.
        with_latest_posts Number of latest posts to include for each group. Must be non-negative. Default: 1, Maximum: 10.
        Returns:
        A callSpec object ready to execute the request.

      • findGroupByKeyword

        @Experimental
public CallSpec<java.util.List<Group>,HttpError> findGroupByKeyword(java.lang.String keywords)
        THIS CALL CURRENTLY DOES NOT WORK DUE TO A PROBLEM WITH THE RESPONSE FORMAT. Returns a list of groups found in accordance with the given list of keywords.

        Possible optional query parameters:

        Parameter Name Description
        limit Restricts the number of groups to be returned. This must be a positive number. Default: 10, Maximum: 100
        offset Offset. This must be a positive number. Default: 0
        Parameters:
        keywords - List of keywords. An empty result will be returned if no keywords provided.
        Returns:
        A callSpec object ready to execute the request.

      • getForumsOfGroup

        public CallSpec<java.util.List<Forum>,HttpError> getForumsOfGroup(java.lang.String groupId)
        Get the list of forums contained in the given group. A note on possible actions: Possible values for the permissions field are: READ, POST. These values indicate if the current logged in user can view or post to each forum.

        Possible optional query parameters:

        Parameter Name Description
        limit Restricts the number of groups to be returned. This must be a positive number. Default: 10, Maximum: 100
        offset Offset. This must be a positive number. Default: 0
        Parameters:
        groupId - ID of the group
        Returns:
        A callSpec object ready to execute the request.

      • getPostsOfForum

        public CallSpec<java.util.List<Post>,HttpError> getPostsOfForum(java.lang.String forumId)
        Get the list of posts contained in the given forum. Posts are sorted by created_at in descending order. A note on possible actions: The permissions field may contain several of the following values: READ, UPDATE, DELETE, LIKE, UNLIKE, RECOMMEND, COMMENT

        Possible optional query parameters:

        Parameter Name Description
        exclude_content Whether the content is excluded from the response or not (default is false).
        limit Restricts the number of groups to be returned. This must be a positive number. Default: 10, Maximum: 100
        offset Offset. This must be a positive number. Default: 0
        user_fields List of user attributes to be returned. If this parameter is not used, only the ID will be returned. For a list of available profile user attributes, please refer to the get user details call.
        Parameters:
        forumId - ID of the forum
        Returns:
        A callSpec object ready to execute the request.

      • getPostInGroup

        public CallSpec<Post,HttpError> getPostInGroup(java.lang.String postId)
        Show a post in a group. A note on possible actions: The permissions field may contain several of the following values: READ, UPDATE, DELETE, LIKE, UNLIKE, RECOMMEND, COMMENT A note on image_url field: The URLs are valid for 6 hours only. Showing a post will not decrement the unread field of the Group posts call. It is not possible to mark individual posts as read; one can mark all posts in a group as read using the Mark a group as read call.

        Possible optional query parameters:

        Parameter Name Description
        user_fields List of user attributes to be returned. If this parameter is not used, only the ID will be returned. For a list of available profile user attributes, please refer to the get user details call.
        Parameters:
        postId - ID of the post
        Returns:
        A callSpec object ready to execute the request.

      • getAllPostsOfGroup

        public CallSpec<java.util.List<Post>,HttpError> getAllPostsOfGroup(java.lang.String groupId)
        Get the list of posts contained in the given group. Posts are sorted by created_at in descending order. A note on possible actions: The permissions field may contain several of the following values: READ, UPDATE, DELETE, LIKE, UNLIKE, RECOMMEND, COMMENT Showing a post will not decrement the unread field. It is not possible to mark individual posts as read; one can mark all posts in a group as read using the Mark a group as read call.

        Possible optional query parameters:

        Parameter Name Description
        exclude_content Whether the content is excluded from the response or not (default is false).
        limit The default limit is 10, the maximum limit is 100
        offset The default offset is 0.
        user_fields Author attributes to return within latest_posts, if requested. For a list of available profile user attributes, please refer to the get user details call.
        Parameters:
        groupId - ID of the group
        Returns:
        A callSpec object ready to execute the request.

        Get the list of likes contained in the given post.

        Possible optional query parameters:

        Parameter Name Description
        limit The default limit is 10, the maximum limit is 100
        offset The default offset is 0.
        user_fields Author attributes to return within latest_posts, if requested. For a list of available profile user attributes, please refer to the get user details call.

        postId - Id of the post
        Returns:
        A callSpec object ready to execute the request.

      • getCommentsOfPost

        public CallSpec<java.util.List<Comment>,HttpError> getCommentsOfPost(java.lang.String postId)
        Get the list of comments contained in the given post. Comments are sorted by created_at in ascending order. A note on possible actions: The permissions field may contain several of the following values: READ, UPDATE, DELETE, LIKE, UNLIKE

        Possible optional query parameters:

        Parameter Name Description
        limit The default limit is 10, the maximum limit is 100
        offset The default offset is 0.
        sort_direction Sort the comment by oldest first ("asc") or by latest first ("desc"). Oldest first is the default behavior.
        user_fields Author attributes to return within latest_posts, if requested. For a list of available profile user attributes, please refer to the get user details call.
        Parameters:
        postId - ID if the post
        Returns:
        A callSpec object ready to execute the request.

      • addCommentToPost

        public CallSpec<java.lang.Void,HttpError> addCommentToPost(java.lang.String content,
                                                           java.lang.String postId)
        Add a new comment to a post. The image has to be less than 9 MB in size. The supported image formats are image/jpeg, image/png, image/gif, image/bmp. The image should be sent as application/json with the image data Base64 encoded in the body: { "image": { "file_name": "test.jpg", "mime_type": "image/jpeg", "content": "Base64 encoded image data" } } Note that until the image has been fully processed a placeholder image will be returned in the comments index call. Call rate limits Per consumer | Per user 50 per minute | 5 per minute 100 per hour | 10 per hour 150 per day | 15 per day In order to get higher rate limit for this call, please send an email to api-support@xing.com. We will then get back to you with further information.

        Possible optional query parameters:

        Parameter Name Description
        image Image attached to the comment
        media_preview_id Id of the media preview that should be shown in the comment.
        Parameters:
        content - UTF-8 encoded content of the comment
        postId - ID of the post
        Returns:
        A callSpec object ready to execute the request.

        Parameters:

      • joinGroup

        public CallSpec<Membership,HttpError> joinGroup(java.lang.String groupId)
        Join an open group or request membership to a closed group. A note on possible member states: The member_state field may contain several of the following values: MEMBER, PENDING_MEMBER, MODERATOR, OWNER
        Parameters:
        groupId - ID of the group
        Returns:
        A callSpec object ready to execute the request.

      • createPost

        public CallSpec<Post,HttpError> createPost(java.lang.String title,
                                           java.lang.String content,
                                           java.lang.String forumId)
        Create a new post in a group. The post must be linked to a forum. Image has to be less than 9 MB large. The supported image formats are image/jpeg, image/png, image/gif, image/bmp. Image should be sent as application/json with the image data Base64 encoded in the body: { "image": { "file_name": "test.jpg", "mime_type": "image/jpeg", "content": "Base64 encoded image data" } } Note that until the image has been fully processed a placeholder image will be returned in the show post call Call rate limits Per consumer | Per user 50 per minute | 5 per minute 100 per hour | 10 per hour 150 per day | 15 per day In order to get higher rate limit for this call, please send an email to api-support@xing.com. We will then get back to you with further information.

        Possible optional query parameters:

        Parameter Name Description
        image Image attached to the post
        media_preview_id Id of the media preview that should be shown in the post.
        user_fields List of user attributes to be returned. If this parameter is not used, only the ID will be returned. For a list of available profile user attributes, please refer to the get user details call.
        Parameters:
        title - UTF-8 encoded title of the post
        content - UTF-8 encoded content of the post
        forumId - ID of the forum where this post should be created
        Returns:
        A callSpec object ready to execute the request.

      • deletePost

        public CallSpec<java.lang.Void,HttpError> deletePost(java.lang.String postId)

        A callSpec object ready to execute the request.

        A callSpec object ready to execute the request.

      • createMediaPreview

        public CallSpec<MediaPreview,HttpError> createMediaPreview(java.lang.String url)
        Creates a media preview. This preview can be used when creating a group post or comment Call rate limits Per consumer | Per user 50 per minute | 5 per minute 100 per hour | 10 per hour 150 per day | 15 per day In order to get higher rate limit for this call, please send an email to api-support@xing.com. We will then get back to you with further information.
        Parameters:
        url - URL of the web site
        Returns:
        A callSpec object ready to execute the request.
